name: BizAppCenter
overview:
BizAppCenter delivers an app store for business.

App stores have been enthusiastically embraced by consumers as a powerful distribution platform. The Mac app store generated $500M in revenue in its first year. Microsoft recently introduced the Windows 8 app store.

But public app stores do not serve businesses: No volume purchasing, no mass deployment/updates, No inventory tracking and in many cases, users do not have privileges to install apps.

BizAppCenter is an app store for businesses. It provides the key functionality required by businesses - yet provide end users with the flexibility they need in a BYO world.

An intro video can be found here: https://vimeo.com/53705445
